properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_NM,PROFILE_IMG,PROFILE_BACK_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL=?
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,NULL,NULL,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_NM,PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM LIKE ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER_IMG, RELEASE_YEAR, COUNTRY FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_IMG = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_BACK_IMG = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER_IMG, RELEASE_YEAR, COUNTRY FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE M WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM EVALUATION E WHERE M.MOVIE_NO = E.MOVIE_NO AND E.MEMBER_NO = ? AND EVALUATION_FL = 'N') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE EVALUATION SET STAR_RATING = ?, EVALUATION_FL = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MOVIE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO EVALUATION VALUES(?,?,?,DEFAULT)
UPDATE EVALUATION SET EVALUATION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MOVIE_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVALUATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND EVALUATION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_CT, A.ENROLL_DT, READ_FL, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG FROM MESSAGE A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE TARGET_NO=? AND MESSAGE_ST='N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, COUNT(*), PROFILE_IMG FROM EVALUATION JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM FOLLOW WHERE TARGET_NO = ? AND FOLLOW_FL = 'N') AND EVALUATION_FL = 'N' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG ORDER BY MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, COUNT(*), PROFILE_IMG FROM EVALUATION JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT TARGET_NO FROM FOLLOW WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND FOLLOW_FL = 'N') AND EVALUATION_FL = 'N' GROUP BY MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, PROFILE_IMG ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
UPDATE FOLLOW SET FOLLOW_FL='Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TARGET_NO = ?
UPDATE FOLLOW SET FOLLOW_FL='N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND TARGET_NO = ?
